title: Beef stroganoff with mushrooms
ingredients: ['400g frying beef or beef steak, cut into thin strips', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '300g soured cream (use less if you prefer a drier dish)', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 beef stock cube', 'Worcestershire sauce', '2 or 3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 or 2 handfuls sliced mushrooms', '1 pinch of cayenne pepper (optional)', 'cooked spinach tagliatelle (or pasta of your choice)', 'olive oil, for frying', 'salt and pepper to taste']
